statements: DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 5 AND question = 'Favorite Color';
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 101 AND answer = 3;

DELETE FROM NPSData WHERE nps_score < 7 AND survey_id = 5;
DELETE FROM nps_scores WHERE survey_id = 123 AND nps_score > 9;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id IN (SELECT response_id FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_score < 5);
